title: Gyumri
page_copy: Listen to radio stations from Gyumri, from a wide variety of genres like Arabic, Classical, Entertainment, Ethnic and Greek. radios.title: Vem Radio
radios.profile_slogan: Alyses & News from Armenia, Christianity & Culture, Classical & Sacred

radio_info.short: Vem Radio carries out the vital service of the spiritual protection of Armenian people, preservation of national values, and propagation of high-quality culture in the
radio_info.rest:
Armenian broadcasting world. Vem is the way to develop and cultivate the aspirations of spiritual enlightenment and national identity. We believe that without inner transformation of the individual, there can be no victory on the national level.
Vem broadcasts 24-hours/7 days a week. In Yerevan and surroundings, it broadcasts at FM 91.1. Vem Radio re-broadcasts in Artsakh and Vanadzor through local partners, and it is also reachable via the Internet around the world.
